quote: If someone is really close with you, your getting upset or them getting upset is okay, and they don’t change because of it. It’s just part of the relationship. It happens. You deal with it.
quote_letters: IF SOMEONE IS REALLY CLOSE WITH YOU YOUR GETTING UPSET OR THEM GETTING UPSET IS OKAY AND THEY DONT CHANGE BECAUSE OF IT ITS JUST PART OF THE RELATIONSHIP IT HAPPENS YOU DEAL WITH IT
